name: Waft
text: You make the targets light enough to be carried by wind. Creatures affected by this spell suffer cumulative penalties for attacking as if under the effects of levitate unless they have a fly speed. Treat each target as two size categories lighter for the purposes of being checked or blown away by wind. If a target has a fly speed, it can fly overland at the wind’s speed in the same direction as the wind by succeeding at a DC 20 Fly check. If a creature flying overland this way attempts to change direction, it risks being blown away as usual. By linking hands or creating a connection with rope, creatures affected by this spell can be towed through the air by a flying creature as if each weighed only one-eighth its actual weight.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料（蒲公英的种子）
target_zh: 最多一个生物每2等级，彼此相距不超过30英尺
text_zh: 你使目标变得轻到足够可以被风携带走。受此法术影响的生物会受到累积的攻击惩罚，就像在浮空术的效果下，除非他们有飞行速度。在风中的检定和判定被吹飞时，将每个目标的体型缩小两个阶段。如果一个目标有飞行速度，他可以通过一个DC20的飞行检定来顺风长途飞行，速度等同于风速。如果一个以这种方式长途飞行的生物试图改变方向，他就会像往常一样有被吹走的危险。通过手牵着手或用绳子连接在一起，受此法术影响的生物可以被飞行的生物拖拽到空中，就好像他们的重量只有实际的八分之一。
